section.title: Dictionary
section.para: The dictionary represents the UI description. Each dictionary relates to a single value object (see ) and contains a dictionarysearch definition describing a UI to search for Value Objects and a dictionaryeditor definition describing a UI to create new and edit already existing ValueObjects.

section.title: Controls
section.para: Similar to the way the central dataypes are managed, each dictionary can hold a central set of control definitions so you can just reference the central definitons where nedded (filter, result, editor, ...) instead of defining the control again and again.

formalpara.title: Sample control definiton

section.para: Defines a text control with the label Name that has to be filled (mandatory) The data that is entered into the control will be written to the attribute countryName of the value object that is connected with the dictionary that the control model resides in (presumably the country value object).
